mapper.select:
SELECT DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NM /* 파트너명 */ , PRTNR_NO /*파트너번호*/ , PRTNR_KNM /*성명*/ , CNTRW_TP_NM /*상품구분*/ , RCPDT /*접수일자*/ , SL_DT /*매출일자*/ , CAN_DT /*취소일자*/ , CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , PD_NM /*상품명*/ , CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , SALE_DIV /*판매구분*/ , NVL(PERF_ELHM, 0) AS PERF_ELHM /*가전*/ , NVL(PERF_CHNG, 0) AS PERF_CHNG /*기번*/ , NVL(PERF_ELHM_EXCD, 0) AS PERF_ELHM_EXCD /*가전외*/ FROM ( SELECT OG.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO , OG.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NM , PRTNR.PRTNR_NO , PRTNR.PRTNR_KNM , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'CNTRW_TP_CD', A2.CNTRW_TP_CD ) AS CNTRW_TP_NM /*상품구분*/ , A1.RCPDT /*접수일자*/ , A1.SL_DT /*매출일자*/ , A2.CNTR_PD_ENDDT AS CAN_DT /*취소일자*/ , A1.CNTR_NO , (SELECT C.PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS C WHERE C.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C.PD_CD = A1.PD_CD) AS PD_NM , (SELECT C.CST_KNM FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS C WHERE C.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C.CST_NO = A2.CNTR_CST_NO ) AS CST_KNM , CASE WHEN A1.MCHN_CH_YN = 'Y' AND A1.MCHN_CH_TP_CD IN (15, 16, 19) THEN '재렌탈' WHEN A1.MCHN_CH_YN = 'Y' AND A1.MCHN_CH_TP_CD IN (1, 18) THEN '기변' ELSE '신규' END SALE_DIV /*판매구분*/ , A1.PERF_ATC_CD , NVL(A1.PERF_VAL, 0) AS PERF_VAL /*실적값*/ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ PRTNR /*월파트너내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ OG /*월조직내역*/ ON PRTNR.BASE_YM = OG.BASE_YM AND PRTNR.OG_TP_CD = OG.OG_TP_CD AND PRTNR.OG_ID = OG.OG_ID AND OG.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN ( SELECT B1.CNTR_NO , B1.CNTR_SN , B1.PRTNR_NO , B2.RCPDT /*접수일자*/ , B2.SL_DT /*매출일자*/ , B2.CAN_DT /*취소일자*/ , B2.PD_CD , B2.MCHN_CH_YN /*기기변경여부*/ , B2.MCHN_CH_TP_CD /*기기변경유형코드*/ , B1.PERF_ATC_CD /*실적항목코드*/ , B1.PERF_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_NTORP_CNTR_MM_CL B1 /*순주문파트너계약월마감*/ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_WELS_NRCTR_MM_CL B2 /*웰스순주문계약월마감*/ ON B1.BASE_YM = B2.BASE_YM AND B1.PERF_YM = B2.PERF_YM AND B1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = B2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD AND B1.CNTR_NO = B2.CNTR_NO AND B1.CNTR_SN = B2.CNTR_SN AND B1.CNTR_PERF_CRT_DV_CD = B2.CNTR_PERF_CRT_DV_CD WHERE B1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND B1.PERF_YM = #{perfYm} AND B1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND B1.CNTR_PERF_CRT_DV_CD = '01' /*순주문집계*/ AND B1.PERF_DV_CD = '0' /*개인판매*/ AND B1.PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '101' /*P조직순주문실적*/ AND B1.CO_CD = '2000' /*교원프라퍼티*/ AND B1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /*P조직*/ AND B1.PERF_ATC_CD IN ('W01P00001', 'W01P00002', 'W01P00004') /*가전,기변,가전외실적*/ AND B2.SL_DT >= #{perfYm}||'01' /*매출일자 과거실적은 조회하지않음. 1566 결함수정*/ ) A1 ON PRTNR.PRTNR_NO = A1.PRTNR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B1.CNTR_NO , B1.CNTR_CST_NO , B2.CNTRW_TP_CD , CASE WHEN B2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301','302','303') THEN B2.CNTR_PD_ENDDT END CNTR_PD_ENDDT FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS B1 /*계약기본*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL B2 /*계약상세*/ ON B1.CNTR_NO = B2.CNTR_NO AND B2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE B1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B1.SELL_PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} ) A2 ON A1.CNTR_NO = A2.CNTR_NO WHERE PRTNR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND PRTNR.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND PRTNR.OG_TP_CD = 'W01'
AND PRTNR.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /* 개인실적 */
AND OG.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /* 조직실적 */ AND OG.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO != PRTNR.PRTNR_NO /* 지점장 본인 실적 제외 */
) PIVOT ( SUM(PERF_VAL) FOR PERF_ATC_CD IN ( 'W01P00001' AS PERF_ELHM , 'W01P00002' AS PERF_CHNG , 'W01P00004' AS PERF_ELHM_EXCD ) ) ORDER BY PRTNR_NO, RCPDT, SL_DT

SELECT T1.BASE_YM AS PERF_YM /* 기준년월 */ , T1.OG_NM AS BLG /* 소속 */ , T1.PRTNR_NO /* 사번 */ , T1.PRTNR_KNM AS EMPL_NM /* 이름 */ , T1.PSTN_DV_CD /* 직급별 분류코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RSB_DV_CD', T1.RSB_DV_CD) AS RSB /* 직책 */ , NVL(T2.INTBS_SUM,0) AS FRR_SUM /* 과세표준계 */ , NVL(T2.DDTN_SUM,0) AS DDTN_SUM /* 공제계 */ , NVL(T2.ACL_DSB_AMT,0) AS ACL_DSB /* 실지급액 */ , E.CD_CNTN AS DSB_BNK /* 지급은행 */ , AB.ACNO_ENCR AS DSB_AC /* 계좌번호*/ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 /* T 월파트너 T*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT SUM(A.INTBS_AMT) AS INTBS_SUM , SUM(A.DDCTAM) AS DDTN_SUM , SUM(A.DSB_OJ_AMT) AS ACL_DSB_AMT FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ A /* 수수료지급내역 */ WHERE A.DSB_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND A.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND A.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND A.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' GROUP BY A.PRTNR_NO, A.OG_TP_CD ) T2 ON 1=1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 ON T1.BASE_YM = T3.BASE_YM AND T1.OG_ID = T3.OG_ID AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T3.OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_AC_BAS AB /* 파트너계좌기본 */ ON T1.PRTNR_NO = AB.PRTNR_NO AND T1.OG_TP_CD = AB.OG_TP_CD AND AB.PRTNR_AC_USWY_CD = '1' -- 수수료계좌사용구분코드 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN AB.VL_STRT_DTM AND AB.VL_END_DTM /* 현재일 수수료계좌 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D E ON AB.FNIT_CD = E.CD_VLD_VAL AND E.CD_ID = 'BNK_CD' AND E.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' WHERE T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 사번 */ AND T1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} /* 기준년월 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* P조직 */ AND AB.DTA_DL_YN ='N'

SELECT #{no} AS PRTNR_NO , NVL(ELHM,0) AS ELHM /* 가전 : W01P00001 */ , NVL(ELHM_EXCP,0) AS ELHM_EXCP /* 가전외 : W01P00004 */ , NVL(ELHM_CHDVC,0) AS ELHM_CHDVC /* 가전기변 : W00P00028 */ , NVL(MUTU,0) AS MUTU /* 개인상조 : W01P00010 */ , NVL(METG_N,0) AS METG_N /* 미팅수 : W01P00012 */ , '개인' AS DIV FROM ( SELECT PERF_ATC_CD , PERF_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_NTORP_PERF_MM_CL S1 /*순주문 파트너 실적 월마감*/ WHERE 1=1 AND S1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND S1.PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '101' AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /*웰스 P조직*/ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND S1.PERF_DV_CD = 0 AND S1.PERF_ATC_CD IN ('W01P00001', 'W01P00004', 'W00P00028', 'W01P00010') AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) PIVOT ( SUM(PERF_VAL) FOR PERF_ATC_CD IN('W01P00001' AS ELHM, 'W01P00004' AS ELHM_EXCP, 'W00P00028' AS ELHM_CHDVC, 'W01P00010' AS MUTU) ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PERF_VAL AS METG_N FROM TB_FEAM_PRTNR_PERF_MM_CL WHERE BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '101' AND PERF_ATC_CD = 'W01P00012' AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T2 ON 1=1 UNION SELECT #{no} AS PRTNR_NO , NVL(ELHM,0) AS ELHM /* 가전 : W01P00001 */ , NVL(ELHM_EXCP,0) AS ELHM_EXCP /* 가전외 : W01P00004 */ , NVL(ELHM_CHDVC,0) AS ELHM_CHDVC /* 가전기변 : W00P00028 */ , NVL(MUTU,0) AS MUTU /* 조직상조 : W01P00034 */ , NULL AS METG_N , '조직' AS DIV FROM ( SELECT PERF_ATC_CD , PERF_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_NTORP_PERF_MM_CL S1 /*순주문 파트너 실적 월마감*/ WHERE 1=1 AND S1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND S1.PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '101' AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /*웰스 P조직*/ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND S1.PERF_DV_CD = 2 AND S1.PERF_ATC_CD IN ('W01P00001', 'W01P00004', 'W00P00028', 'W01P00034') AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) PIVOT ( SUM(PERF_VAL) FOR PERF_ATC_CD IN('W01P00001' AS ELHM, 'W01P00004' AS ELHM_EXCP, 'W00P00028' AS ELHM_CHDVC, 'W01P00034' AS MUTU) )

SELECT ITEM1, FVAL1, ITEM2,FVAL2, ITEM3, FVAL3 FROM ( /* 기타 수수료 */ SELECT T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM AS ITEM3 , T2.FEE_ATC_VAL AS FVAL3 , ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ T1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ T2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON T1.DSB_YM = T2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.CO_CD = T2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = T2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S1.FEE_CD , NVL(S2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, S1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SRN_MARK_FEE_NM , S1.SRN_MARK_ODR_SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD S1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL S2 ON S1.FEE_CD = S2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S2.APY_STRT_YM AND S2.APY_END_YM AND S2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S1.APY_STRT_YM AND S1.APY_END_YM AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T4 ON T2.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ /* @OZParam.AKSDYM@ */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ /* @OZParam.AKDCDE@ */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ AND T4.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '07' /* 수수료항목유형코드 = 07 : 기타수수료 */ ) A1 FULL OUTER JOIN ( /* 개인 수수료 */ SELECT T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM AS ITEM1 , T2.FEE_ATC_VAL AS FVAL1 , ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ T1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ T2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON T1.DSB_YM = T2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.CO_CD = T2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = T2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S1.FEE_CD , NVL(S2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, S1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SRN_MARK_FEE_NM , S1.SRN_MARK_ODR_SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD S1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL S2 ON S1.FEE_CD = S2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S2.APY_STRT_YM AND S2.APY_END_YM AND S2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S1.APY_STRT_YM AND S1.APY_END_YM AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T4 ON T2.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ /* @OZParam.AKSDYM@ */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ /* @OZParam.AKDCDE@ */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ AND T4.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '02' /* 수수료항목유형코드 = 02 : 개인수수료 */ ) A2 ON A2.SN = A1.SN FULL OUTER JOIN ( /* 조직 수수료 */ SELECT T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM AS ITEM2 , T2.FEE_ATC_VAL AS FVAL2 , ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY T3.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ T1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ T2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON T1.DSB_YM = T2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.CO_CD = T2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = T2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S1.FEE_CD , NVL(S2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, S1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS SRN_MARK_FEE_NM , S1.SRN_MARK_ODR_SN FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD S1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL S2 ON S1.FEE_CD = S2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S2.APY_STRT_YM AND S2.APY_END_YM AND S2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN S1.APY_STRT_YM AND S1.APY_END_YM AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T4 ON T2.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ /* @OZParam.AKSDYM@ */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ /* @OZParam.AKDCDE@ */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ AND T4.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '03' /* 수수료항목유형코드 = 03 : 조직수수료 */ ) A3 ON A3.SN = NVL(A1.SN, A2.SN)

SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'FEE_DDTN_TP_CD', T2.FEE_DDTN_TP_CD) AS ITEM , T2.FEE_ATC_VAL AS FVAL FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ T1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ T2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON T1.DSB_YM = T2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.CO_CD = T2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = T2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = T2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ AND T1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 02 : 공제 */ AND T2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */

SELECT ITEM /* 가지급금 항목명 */ , LSTMM /* 전월잔액 */ , THM_OC /* 당월발생 */ , TMH /* 당월합계 */ , THM_DDTN /* 당월공제 */ , THM_BLAM /* 당월잔액 */ FROM ( SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PNPYAM_ATC_CD', S1.PNPYAM_ATC_CD) AS ITEM , NVL(S3.OC_PNPYAM_OC_AMT, 0) - NVL(S4.OC_PNPYAM_DDCTAM, 0) AS LSTMM /* 전월잔액 */ , NVL(S2.MM_PNPYAM_OC_AMT, 0) AS THM_OC /* 당월발생 */ , (NVL(S3.OC_PNPYAM_OC_AMT, 0) - NVL(S4.OC_PNPYAM_DDCTAM, 0)) + NVL(S2.MM_PNPYAM_OC_AMT, 0) AS TMH /* 당월합계 */ , NVL(S1.MM_PNPYAM_DDCTAM, 0) AS THM_DDTN /* 당월공제 */ , ((NVL(S3.OC_PNPYAM_OC_AMT, 0) - NVL(S4.OC_PNPYAM_DDCTAM, 0)) + NVL(S2.MM_PNPYAM_OC_AMT, 0)) - NVL(S1.MM_PNPYAM_DDCTAM, 0) AS THM_BLAM /* 당월잔액 */ , M.DDTN_APY_ODR /* 공제적용순서 */ FROM ( SELECT T1.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ , T1.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ , T2.PNPYAM_ATC_CD /* 가지급금항목코드 */ , T2.DDTN_APY_ODR /* 공제적용순서 */ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 /* 월파트너내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEDD_PNPYAM_CD T2 /* 가지급금코드 */ ON T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} /* 기준년월 */ AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ ) M LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ , OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ , PNPYAM_ATC_CD /* 가지급금항목코드 */ , SUM(PNPYAM_DDCTAM) AS MM_PNPYAM_DDCTAM /* 가지급금공제금액 */ FROM TB_FEDD_PNPY_DDTN_IZ /* 가지급공제내역 */ WHERE 1=1 AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ AND OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND PNPYAM_DDCTAM > 0 /* 가지급금공제금액 */ AND DDTN_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{perfYm}, 'YYYYMM'), 1), 'YYYYMM') /* 공제년월 */ AND PNPY_DDTN_TP_CD = '1' /* 가지급공제유형코드 */ AND CO_CD IN ('2000','P0') GROUP BY PRTNR_NO, OG_TP_CD, PNPYAM_ATC_CD ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PNPYAM_ATC_CD) ASC ) S1 /* 당월 가지급금 공제 */ ON M.PRTNR_NO = S1.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND M.PNPYAM_ATC_CD = S1.PNPYAM_ATC_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ , OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ , PNPYAM_ATC_CD /* 가지급금항목코드 */ , SUM(PNPYAM_OC_AMT) AS MM_PNPYAM_OC_AMT /* 가지급금발생금액 */ FROM TB_FEDD_PNPY_OC_BAS /* 가지급발생기본 */ WHERE 1=1 AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ AND OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND PNPYAM_OC_AMT > 0 /* 가지급금발생금액 */ AND PNPYAM_OC_YM = #{perfYm} /* 가지급금발생년월 */ AND PNPY_OC_TP_CD = '1' /* 가지급공제유형코드 */ AND CO_CD IN ('2000','P0') GROUP BY PRTNR_NO, OG_TP_CD, PNPYAM_ATC_CD ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PNPYAM_ATC_CD) ASC ) S2 /* 당월 가지급금 발생 */ ON M.PRTNR_NO = S2.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = S2.OG_TP_CD AND M.PNPYAM_ATC_CD = S2.PNPYAM_ATC_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ , OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ , PNPYAM_ATC_CD /* 가지급금항목코드 */ , SUM(PNPYAM_OC_AMT) AS OC_PNPYAM_OC_AMT /* 가지급금발생금액 */ FROM TB_FEDD_PNPY_OC_BAS /* 가지급발생기본 */ WHERE 1=1 AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ AND OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND PNPYAM_OC_AMT > 0 /* 가지급금발생금액 */ AND PNPYAM_OC_YM < #{perfYm} /* 가지급금발생년월 */ AND CO_CD IN ('2000','P0') GROUP BY PNPYAM_ATC_CD, OG_TP_CD, PRTNR_NO ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PNPYAM_ATC_CD) ASC ) S3 /* 전월 가지급금 발생내역합계 */ ON M.PRTNR_NO = S3.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = S3.OG_TP_CD AND M.PNPYAM_ATC_CD = S3.PNPYAM_ATC_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ , OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ , PNPYAM_ATC_CD /* 가지급금항목코드 */ , SUM(PNPYAM_DDCTAM) AS OC_PNPYAM_DDCTAM /* 가지급금공제금액 */ FROM TB_FEDD_PNPY_DDTN_IZ /* 가지급공제내역 */ WHERE 1=1 AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ AND OG_TP_CD = 'W01' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND PNPYAM_DDCTAM > 0 /* 가지급금공제금액 */ AND DDTN_YM < TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{perfYm}, 'YYYYMM'), 1), 'YYYYMM') /* 공제년월 */ AND CO_CD IN ('2000','P0') GROUP BY PNPYAM_ATC_CD, OG_TP_CD, PRTNR_NO ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PNPYAM_ATC_CD) ASC ) S4 /* 전월 가지급금 공제내역합계 */ ON M.PRTNR_NO = S4.PRTNR_NO AND M.OG_TP_CD = S4.OG_TP_CD AND M.PNPYAM_ATC_CD = S4.PNPYAM_ATC_CD ) T WHERE T.THM_DDTN > 0 ORDER BY T.DDTN_APY_ODR
